SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class HashFunctionItem

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.HashFunctionItem
public class HashFunctionItem extends Object
Represents an item in the hash function selection list within the RSA key generation view. This class holds the name of the hash function and properties to manage user selection and custom hash size specifications.

  • Property Summary

    Properties
    Type
    Property
    Description
    javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty
    checked
    Property to track whether this hash function is selected by the user.
    javafx.beans.property.StringProperty
    comboBoxSelection
    Property to store the user's selection for the hash function's output mode, such as "Standard", "Provably Secure", or "Custom".
    javafx.beans.property.StringProperty
    customHashSize
    Property to store the custom hash size specified by the user when "Custom" mode is selected.
